Cherrycake\Location::loadFromGivenLocationIds

loadFromGivenLocationIds

Loads this Location using the given countryId, regionId and cityId data keys on the $data array countryId and regionId can be overriden if cityId is specified. countryId can be overriden if regionId and cityId is specified. Takes into account that some cities may no be associated to a region, but only to a country

    Signature

    public function loadFromGivenLocationIds(array $data )

    Parameters

    $data — array
    The location ids

    Returns

    boolean
    True on success, false otherwise
